reviews.author: Willow Roark
reviews.review:
I lived there for a 2 years. It wasn't horrible but there were a lot of issues.
Pros: There's a gorgeous trail right next to it that leads right to the interurban system, the high school, and Joe's Garden. There's always bunnies and birds

reviews.author: R H
reviews.review: It took weeks/months for maintenance to fix requests which still were done wrong. There has been on and off construction for a year, the water was shut off randomly because they hit a line, then they boarded off the back doors in each unit

reviews.author: Gage Hall
reviews.review: My Maintenance was scheduled on my time and the handyman, Steve, was extremely kind and outgoing, he made a quick an easy job fixing my bathroom shower head and sink stopper.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you Gage for the review

reviews.author: Jordyn Michelle
reviews.review: Not fancy by any means. You can tell management and handymen care, but youre still paying an arm and a leg for four walls and a toilet.
